name: LifeSite, Inc.
description: Developer of an online life and family management platform designed to manage family records and documents. The company's platform combines file access and controlled, permission-based sharing with high-level document encryption and security, enabling users to get a safe and smart digital storage solution to store, organize and access the most important information in their life anytime and anywhere.
one_liner: Developer of an online life and family management platform designed to manage family records and documents. The company's platform combines file access and controlled, permission-based sharing with high-level document encryption and security, enabling users to get a safe and smart digital storage solution to store, organize and access the most important information in their life anytime and anywhere.
